boardGames.title: Scrabble
boardGames.description: A crossword game commonly played with English alphabets and words
boardGames.origin: Started by an architect named Alfred Mosher Butts in the year 1938
boardGames.alternateNames: Scrabulous (a version of the game on Facebook)

boardGames.title: Checkers
boardGames.description: Two players start with dark and light colored pieces. The pieces move diagonally.
